nodes.text: Star Wars Droids 8: Star Wars According to the Droids, Book III: The Last Jedi is the eighth and final issue of the Star Wars: Droids series of comics.

After making it back to the Millennium Falcon, following the death of Obi-Wan Kenobi, C-3PO & R2-D2 are brought to Yavin, where Artoo delivers the Death Star plans to the Rebel Alliance. Upon their arrival, the Droids discover and destroy a homing droid tracking their whereabouts, following this, Artoo joins Luke Skywalker on the Rebel assault on the Death Star.

This series was based on the Star Wars Droids animated TV series, but the stories are original and not adaptations of the show. This particular storyarc, however, was a semi-adaptation of the events of A New Hope, with additional backstory added through the eyes of C-3PO & R2-D2.
Published under the Marvel Comics, Star Comics imprint, this is the final issue of the series, with a cover price of $1.00 U.S. and $1.25 Canadian.
